whatWentWrong.title: Complete Domination
whatWentWrong.description: Wisconsin won by 17 - not even close

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: No - this was a complete collapse. Illinois scoring only 10 at home was inexcusable. Rivalry games are unpredictable.

closingLineValue.verdict: No line movement - even money throughout

keyTakeaways: Rivalry games are unpredictable regardless of records
verdict: Disaster. Illinois got crushed at home 27-10. Wisconsin dominated both sides. Rivalry trap game.
